hotels.name: Ett Hem
hotels.desc: Serene minimalist design hotel, intimate atmosphere, curated interiors
hotels.longDesc: A tranquil Stockholm boutique hotel celebrating serene minimalism and thoughtful design, where every detail invites guests into a carefully curated home-like sanctuary.

hotels.name: Sibbjans
hotels.desc: Restored 1870s farm hotel, farm-to-table restaurant, local ingredients, modern luxury
hotels.longDesc: A stylish boutique hotel occupying a restored 1870s farm with nine modern rooms and rustic farmstead quarters. The property's working farm supplies the restaurant with vegetables, herbs, and meat for extravagant set menus.

hotels.name: Clarion Hotel Sign
hotels.desc: Modern luxury hotel, rooftop bar with city views, central location near Norrmalm
hotels.longDesc: A contemporary luxury hotel perfectly positioned for families exploring Stockholm's vibrant city center, offering modern amenities and easy access to attractions.

hotels.name: Tree Hotel
hotels.desc: Unique treehouses, nature immersion, magical forest experience for adventurous families
hotels.longDesc: Spend nights in whimsical treehouses nestled in pristine Swedish forests, offering unforgettable bonding moments and enchanting views for the whole family.

restaurants.name: Vete-Katten Kungsgatan
restaurants.desc: Historic Swedish bakery and cafÃ©, traditional pastries, cozy atmosphere, perfect for fika time
restaurants.longDesc: A beloved Stockholm institution since 1920, serving authentic Swedish baked goods and traditional coffee culture in a charming, welcoming setting ideal for families.

experiences.name: Stockholm to Narvik Night Train
experiences.desc: Overnight sleeper train through Scandinavia, northern lights viewing, scenic arctic route
experiences.longDesc: An enchanting overnight train journey from Stockholm through Swedish Lapland to Norwegian Narvik, passing through icy fjords and offering prime northern lights viewing opportunities from first-class sleeper cabins.

experiences.name: Stockholm
experiences.desc: Departure point for northern lights train journey, Scandinavian gateway city
experiences.longDesc: Sweden's capital city serves as the starting point for the overnight sleeper train adventure to the Arctic, offering Scandinavian culture and urban exploration before embarking northward.

experiences.name: LuleÃ¥
experiences.desc: Arctic Swedish city, northern lights viewing location, train stop on route to Narvik
experiences.longDesc: A northern Swedish city positioned in the Arctic Circle, serving as a stop on the overnight train route and offering northern lights viewing opportunities during winter months.

experiences.name: Kiruna
experiences.desc: Swedish Lapland city, northern lights destination, train station on Arctic route
experiences.longDesc: A legendary Lapland city renowned for northern lights viewing and Arctic experiences, situated on the scenic overnight train route between Stockholm and Narvik.

experiences.name: Dalarna
experiences.desc: Flower-filled cultural region, folk art traditions, Midsommar magic, scenic Nordic landscapes
experiences.longDesc: A picturesque Swedish region celebrated for its vibrant folk art, flower-filled meadows, and rich tradition of Midsommar festivities throughout summer.

experiences.name: Gothenburg
experiences.desc: Charming Swedish coastal city, flower-filled streets, fika tradition, Nordic summer vibes
experiences.longDesc: Sweden's welcoming coastal city known for its vibrant flower displays, cherished fika coffee culture, and abundance of summer activities and Nordic charm.

experiences.name: Sweden's Lakes and Forests
experiences.desc: Lakes and forests with wild swimming, floating saunas, fresh air, Nordic nature
experiences.longDesc: Sweden's pristine lakes and forests offer wild swimming experiences, unique floating saunas, and the magical midnight sun of Nordic summer.

experiences.name: Swedish Archipelago
experiences.desc: Vast 30,000-island archipelago, island hopping adventures, maritime summer experiences
experiences.longDesc: Sweden's breathtaking archipelago comprising 30,000 islands offers endless opportunities for summer exploration, island hopping, and maritime adventures.

experiences.name: Fotografiska Museum Stockholm
experiences.desc: World-class photography museum, rotating exhibitions, interactive displays, waterfront location
experiences.longDesc: A stunning photography museum housed in a beautiful waterfront building, featuring captivating exhibitions and engaging spaces that inspire visitors of all ages.

kidFriendly.longDesc: An exhilarating wildlife park where families can experience exotic animals up close, enjoy thrilling activities, and create lasting memories together in a natural setting.

markets.name: Ã–stermalms Food Hall
markets.desc: Historic covered market, Swedish delicacies, fresh produce, artisan foods, local vendors
markets.longDesc: Stockholm's iconic market hall since 1888, brimming with Swedish flavors, local specialties, and culinary treasures that offer families an authentic taste of Sweden.

a.name: Swedish Family Adventure: Stockholm, Archipelago & Arctic Treehouses (10 Days)
a.description: From Stockholm's cobblestoned streets and island-hopping adventures to sleeping in magical treehouses under the northern lightsâ€”a Swedish journey designed for wonder at every age.
